snippet.title: Esoterica Order Teaser
snippet.description:
Jump into the unknown with this third person shooter, playing as a super soldier known as a Phantom. Taking on the enemy race called The Despair. You will be facing off against numerous threats from your typical infantry units to brute like tanks and even mechanical robots.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2520650/Esoterica_Order/
